DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study explore safety tolerability AZD5069 steady-state , follow twice day oral dose healthy subject . AZD5069 develop AstraZeneca study carry behalf sponsor Quintiles Drug Research Unit Guy 's Hospital , London . This second time AZD5069 administer human clinical trial . We conduct study determine whether AZD5069 safe well tolerate healthy male female different dose level 8-day dosing period . We also study quickly AZD5069 absorb clear body . It plan 3 dose group study group consist 12 volunteer , 9 receive active drug 3 receiving placebo . The study involve 3 visit approximately 8 week , include 1 residential visit last 10 night follow .
